attributes.action: Allow hairdressers and barbershops to continue working during lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
Having a haircut is not only good for ones well being it is a very important part of our lives.
Since we shared a common ancestor grooming has been part of every day life and some would argue it's as important as eating.
attributes.background: Keep the hairdressing going it is essential that the people can keep up moral and be groomed during these very trying times.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Since you started your petition, the national lockdown has ended. You could start a new petition calling for changes to the current tiered restrictions, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
